title: Democrats Force Nuclear Option on Gorsuch Nomination (Audio)
itunes:title: Democrats Force Nuclear Option on Gorsuch Nomination (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Kevin Whitelaw, a Congress editor for Bloomberg News, discusses the latest news on the confirmation of Supreme Court candidate Neil Gorsuch and the Republican decision to enact the nuclear option. He speaks with Greg Stohr Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
